articles.content: So all said and done, after Wastelanders, is Fallout 76 worth your time and money? Well, it's certainly made the base game significantly better, in that it can now actually be fun and engaging, and feels like a Fallout experience. That said, in it's current s… [+719 chars]

articles.content: Still waiting for Capcom to release a new Dino Crisis game? Well wait no longer... Kind of. Check out Resident Evil 3 modded with the Dino Evil 3 (by Darknessvaltier) and Regina (by Marcos RC) mod.

articles.title: 'Stranded Deep' on PS4 and XBox One: Release Date, Price and Reviews - Newsweek
articles.description: The long-awaited first-person survival game has been available as an early access version on Steam since 2015.
articles.content:
Stranded Deep will be launching on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One, today, April 21. The game will be released at 1 a.m. local time on Xbox One and at 11 a.m. ET on PS4.
